title: ISic020752

layout.p:
The text is painted on the wall of the vessel, arranged in two parallel bands spaced out by a geometric decoration.
                                            The two strips have about the same number of letters and are arranged symmetrically to one another.

provenanceFound._: Found during the excavations (Soprintendenza alle Antichità di Siracusa, 1966—1968) in the area of the settlement.

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

museum.name: Museo Regionale Archeologico Pietro Griffo
museum.description: Comprehensive collection of archaeological material discovered at the site of Agrigento and in Agrigento province, organised both by chronology and type across a number of rooms and corridors

location.address: Contrada San Nicola, 12 Valley of the Temples, 92100 - Agrigento (AG)
